title: Establishes the department of corrections shall provide an inmate, upon his or her discharge, with educational information about the prevention of HIV
summary: Establishes the department of corrections shall provide an inmate, upon his or her discharge, with educational information about the prevention of human immunodeficiency virus (HIV), instructions about how to obtain free HIV testing and referrals to community-based HIV prevention, education and counseling resources.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) prevention
